revision.text: ==Asturian== ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|ast|la|iustitia|iūstitia, jūstitia}}. Cf. also {{m|ast|xusteza}}. ===Noun=== {{ast-noun|f|xusticies}} # {{l|en|justice}} {{gloss|state of being just or fair}} ====Synonyms==== * {{l|ast|xusteza}} ---- ==Leonese== ===Etymology=== {{rfe|roa-leo}} ===Noun=== {{head|roa-leo|noun|g=f|plural|xusticias}} # [[justice]] ===References=== * [http://www.lengualeonesa.eu/castellan/Diccionario AEDLL]
